text: Niccayamāka muslim āṇkaḷum peṇkaḷum, nampikkaiyuṭaiya āṇkaḷum peṇkaḷum, (iṟaivaṉukkum avaṉuṭaiya tūtarukkum) kīḻppaṭiyum āṇkaḷum peṇkaḷum, uṇmaiyē kūṟum āṇkaḷum peṇkaḷum, poṟumaiyuḷḷa āṇkaḷum peṇkaḷum, (allāhvukkup) payantu naṭakkum āṇkaḷum peṇkaḷum, tāṉam ceyyum āṇkaḷum peṇkaḷum, nōṉpu nōṟkum āṇkaḷum peṇkaḷum, kaṟpuḷḷa āṇkaḷum peṇkaḷum, allāhvuṭaiya tiruppeyarai atikamāka niṉaivukūrum āṇkaḷum peṇkaḷum ākiya ivarkaḷukku allāh maṉṉippaiyum makattāṉa kūliyaiyum tayārpaṭutti vaittirukkiṟāṉ
